thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | www.flashbay.com
thread.title: Giancarmelo

author: Giancarmelo
title: Giancarmelo
text:
I urgently needed to order some usb flash drive for an event and I came across this website through google search.
I called the phone number and spoke with Adam who assisted me very promptly; he immediately understood my needs and helped me to complete the order very quickly.
The product was delivered 1 day earlier than expected and I was pleased to see that everything was perfect.
Thank you!
